desc: A crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Lugina
lore: A crystal that radiates green light. It is an Item required to evolve the mock Unit based on Lugina. The memories of the real Lugina, who was able to realize his own potential anew, are sealed within this crystal. Noel of the Summoners' Research Lab and Rhynt of the Imperial Library purified this stone through their efforts together, though rumor has it Noel was not very keen on this.
name: Emerald
